t: Revell Celebrates 150 Years
s: July 31, 2020 - In a way, Revell Publishing hasn’t changed since 1870, even as it has evolved from its evangelist beginnings into a contemporary trade house offering faithful living advice, inspiring personal narratives, and novels that always end on an up note.

t: Fleming H. Revell – Curiosmith
